1.「チャオー！| バジェオじいさんの家へ ようこそー！: Chao! Welcome to Grandpa Bageo's house!

2.「……って お前さん 見ない顔じゃな。| もしや わしの技師としてのウデを見込ん: I... You don't look familiar... Did you come|here to offer me a job because of my skill as|an engineer?

3.「じゃが 残念ー！ ワシは技師を辞めて| 隠居生活を 満喫チューなのじゃ！| 仕: But, alas! I've quit my job as an engineer|and I'm living the life of a recluse. If you|want to talk about work, no thanks...

4.「……な なにっ？ お前さん| エイブラム船長の使いで来たじゃとっ！？: ... What? What? You're here on Captain|Abram's errand!

5.「ふ…ふんっ！ エイブラムなんて 知らんもん！| 知らんって言ったら 知らんもん: Hmm... Huh! I don't know Abram! I said I|don't know, I don't know!

6.バジェオに|技師の工具かばんを 渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Do you want me to give Bageo the foreman's|tool bag?<yesno><close>

7.「もう エイブラムなんて 知らんもん！| 知らんって言ったら 知らんもん！！: I don't know Abram anymore! I said I don't|know, I don't know!

8.<pc>は|技師の工具かばんを 取りだした！: <pc> has retrieved the foreman's tool bag!

9.「これは…… ワシの仕事道具……！| しかも なんじゃ？ 壊れたスパナの代わりに: This is... My work tools. And what is it?|There's a high-tech wrench in here instead of|a broken wrench.

10.「くっ！ エイブラムめ！ なんで| ワシの愛用のスパナを 取り替えたんじゃ！？|: Damn it! Abram! Why did you replace my|favorite wrench? You... You've made it so|high-tech!

11.「ワシが あのスパナに| どれほどの愛着を持っていたか！ 壊れたら直し| 古さな: You have no idea how attached I was to that|wrench! I used to fix them when they broke,|and I loved the oldness of them!

12.「まったく 勝手なことをしやが……: Oh, my God You're so selfish

15.「勝手なことをするな……か。| そう言えば アイツも ケンカした時| 同じこと言: Don't do anything you don't want to do. ....|You know, he said the same thing when we|fought...

18.「エイブラムめ こしゃくなマネを！| オーケー オーケー！ ワシも 悪かったわ！: Abram, you're such a prick! Okay, okay, okay!|I'm sorry, too! I'm the one who did it first!

19.「そう……。ワシは あのエイブラムが| 何より愛する グランドタイタス号の心臓部: So... I love Abram more than anything. He's|the heart of the Grand Titus. I must have|done something to the power unit...

20.「修理の時…… ワシは ヤツのためを思い| あの船が 迷いの霧の嵐にも耐えられる:
When it came time for repairs... I thought it|would be best for him if I developed a modern|powerplant that would allow that ship to|
|withstand the foggy storms of the lost...

21.「なのに アイツときたら 船の最大の| ミリョクである 武骨で味わいのある動力装: And now he's pissed off that I've taken the|ship's greatest achievement, its rugged,|tasteful powerplant, and made it high-tech!

22.「あんときは なんて了見のせまいヤツじゃ！ と| 怒りにまかせ 工具かばんをほっ: I was so angry that I threw away my tool bag.|In a fit of rage, I threw away my tool bag|and got off the ship...

23.「同じことをされて ワシもわかった。| よかれと思ってやったことが| 相手を怒ら: I've been there, done that. I know. You know,|sometimes the things we do for the best of|reasons can really piss people off.

24.「まあ これで おあいこじゃ！| かばんを届けてくれたのは 技師を続けろという|: Well, now we're even! The delivery of the|satchel was Abram's way of telling me to keep|working as a foreman.

25.「さて……まずは この 技師の工具かばんで| たまった仕事を片付けることから 始: Well... I'll start by cleaning up the work in|this engineer's tool bag... What? Speaking of|which...

26.「グランゼドーラ城の例の装置も そろそろ……。| おっと！ すまん こっちの話じ: The device in the Granzedora Castle is about|to be... Oh, no! I'm sorry, this is... Well,|give my regards to Abram!

27.「チャオー！| 天才技師バジェオの家に ようこそー！: Chao! Welcome to the home of the genius|engineer, Baguio!

28.「……っと お前さんか。| いつぞやは 世話になったのう。: ... Hey, you... You've been a big help to|me...

29.「エイブラムのヤツは 相変わらず素直じゃなくて| わざわざ スパナを交換して 届: Abram's guy was as naive as ever| I can't believe you went to all this trouble to get me a new spanner| You've gone to a lot of trouble, but

30.「工具が戻ってきて 正直 助かった。| グランゼドーラ城の あの装置も そろそろ: It's good to have my tools back, honestly.|It's about time we did some maintenance on|that contraption at Granzedora Castle!

31.「さすがは エイブラム！| バッチリ グッドな タイミングじゃったぞい！| ……: That's Abram! You timed it perfectly. You|timed it perfectly. ... Say hello to Abram|for me!
